  • Method Details

    • createSuperhero

      @Cacheable(value="entity", cacheManager="springCM") public SuperheroDto createSuperhero(SuperheroDto sh)
      Creates a new superhero by taking the received DTO and turning it into a DB object and saving it into the DB. The ids are set to be generated sequentially.
      Specified by:
      createSuperhero in interface SuperheroService
      Parameters:
      sh - The received DTO with the data of the request.
      Returns:
      newSuperhero The new object added to the DB after it is turned back into a DTO.

    • getAllSuperheroes

      public SuperheroResponse getAllSuperheroes(int pages, int pageSize)
      Lists all the superheroes by retrieving them from the DB and converting them into a DTO by going through the list, converting them into a DTO and adding them into the final list.
      Specified by:
      getAllSuperheroes in interface SuperheroService
      Parameters:
      pages - The number of pages.
      pageSize - The size of the page.
      Returns:
      allSuperheroes The list of all the superheroes.

    • getSuperheroById

      @Cacheable(value="entity", cacheManager="springCM") public SuperheroDto getSuperheroById(Long id)
      Gets an specific superhero from the DB by the provided id and returning it as a DTO. If the specified id does not exist in the DB an exception ins thrown.
      Specified by:
      getSuperheroById in interface SuperheroService
      Parameters:
      id - The specified id.
      Returns:
      foundSuperhero The superhero found by the id.
      Throws:
      SuperheroNotFoundException - Exception that notifies that the specified id does not exist in the DB.

    • getAllSuperheroesContainingString

      @Cacheable(value="entity", cacheManager="springCM") public List<SuperheroDto> getAllSuperheroesContainingString(String string)
      Lists all the superheroes that share a string in their name by retrieving them from the DB and converting them into a DTO by going through the list, converting them into a DTO and adding them into the final list.
      Specified by:
      getAllSuperheroesContainingString in interface SuperheroService
      Parameters:
      string - The string specified in the petition.
      Returns:
      allSuperheroesWithString All the superheroes found that share that string.

    • patchSuperhero

      @Cacheable(value="entity", cacheManager="springCM") public SuperheroDto patchSuperhero(Long id, SuperheroDto patchedSuperhero)
      Updates an existing superhero by retrieving it from the DB and patching the changed fields with a mapper and then returning the new patched object from the DB. If the specified id does not exist in the DB an exception ins thrown.
      Specified by:
      patchSuperhero in interface SuperheroService
      Parameters:
      id - The specified id.
      patchedSuperhero - The data to be changed in the superhero object.
      Returns:
      patchedSuperhero The superhero that was updated with the new changes.
      Throws:
      SuperheroNotFoundException - Exception that notifies that the specified id does not exist in the DB.

    • deleteSuperhero

      @Cacheable(value="entity", cacheManager="springCM") public void deleteSuperhero(Long id)
      Deletes an specific superhero from the DB by the specified id. If the specified id does not exist in the DB an exception ins thrown.
      Specified by:
      deleteSuperhero in interface SuperheroService
      Parameters:
      id - The specified id.
      Throws:
      SuperheroNotFoundException - Exception that notifies that the specified id does not exist in the DB.
